resources.string: Jieshuo Extension
Type faster

This extension is useful in the following situations 
 1. The extension provides access for Jieshuo, VoiceBack, and Prudence to Samsung Internet 
 2. This extension allows faster typing on the Samsung keyboard 
 Please note that not all keyboards may be supported, and you may need to enable double-tap typing in your screen reader settings 

 Created by Smit TV 
 https://github.com/Smit-TV
Keyboard
Activate keys with a single tap
Donâ€™t forget to enable double-tap typing in your screen reader
Disable gestures when the keyboard is open
Gestures in the keyboard area will be disabled. \n Note that double-tap will not work in the keyboard area. \n This feature may not work with TalkBack.
Long press delay
Long press works when holding down keys. \n Use 0 to disable this feature
General
Open Accessibility
Donate
Thank you to everyone who donated! \n Tap "Continue" to go to the donation page
Continue
Cancel
Telegram channel
Create debug file
After creating the log file, it should be sent to the developer. This can be done via the official Telegram channel
Disable explore by touch when the keyboard is open
This may improve performance with some keyboards and increase typing speed \n Note: This disables explore by touch only in the keyboard area
Resume explore by touch and gesture detection when touching an element outside the keyboard
For example: When you touch the back button on the navigation bar
Debug mode
Enabling this mode may reduce performance\nThe file may contain personal data
